SYSTEM: MGPGLD-v3.pdf: Página 11
RDF - SPARQL
11
•
Query: “Tell me who are the persons who have Antonio as colleague”
© Slide adapted from “RDF and RDF Schema”- Raúl García et al.
urjc:Antonio
?
person:hasColleague
•
Result: urjc:Alberto and urjc:Idafen
•
SPARQL query language for RDF. W3C recommendation
SELECT ?s 
WHERE { ?s person:hasColleague urjc:Antonio.}
urjc:Alberto
urjc:Antonio
urjc:Idafen
“Alberto Fernández”

person:hasColleague
person:hasColleague
“Male”
